document.full_text: rookie sensation michael grabner, who led the islanders with 34 goals after being claimed off waivers, is staying with new york after agreeing to a five-year, $15 million deal that keeps him away from free agency.
document.title: isles ink rookie grabner to 5-year deal
lines_and_colors: rookie sensation michael grabner, who led the islanders with 34 goals after being claimed off waivers, is staying with new york after agreeing to a five-year, $15 million deal that keeps him away from free agency.
